message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

The paper discusses the use of Convolutional and Recurrent Neural Networks for video and image description, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) fields. The proposed contributions of combining object and location information and introducing Bidirectional Recurrent Neural Networks also suggest a focus on improving the accuracy and efficiency of the model, which aligns with the goals of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Additionally, the use of video descriptions suggests a potential overlap with multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category.
